roleset.name: become rusty
roleset.note: RUST-V NOTES: Based on WSJ. Member of VNcls entity_specific_cos-45.5, entity_specific_modes_being-47.2. (from rust.01-v)

example.name: adjectival
example.text: Pictures of rusted oil drums swim into focus, and the female voice purrs, ``That hazardous waste on his [Mr. Courter's] property -- the neighbors are suing for consumer fraud.''

example.name: ARG1
example.text: Your gold and silver will rust , and that rust will be a proof that you were wrong .

example.name: both args
example.text: The steady dripping of water rusted the metal
